phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
In order to heal Asta's arms,
which were rendered useless after the battle with Vetto,
Noelle and Finral went to visit certain exiles...
I just got out of the bath
Would you fix your bad habit of getting naked already?!
Former Diamond Kingdom Military Commander Fanzell Kruger
A former Diamond Kingdom military commander, Fanzell Kruger,
Brilliant Magic Item Artisan Dominante Code
his fiancee and brilliant magic item artisan, Dominante Code,
Do you have any ideas on how to fix Asta's arms?
Even if it is just a rumor?
There is one thing I can think of.
With the magic of the queen there...
The smartest witch to ever grace this world
since the creation of the land of witches is back!
I need something, so open up!
Domina, what is the Witches' Forest?
It is an autonomous region that lies east
of the Clover Kingdom, near the border of the Diamond Kingdom.
All of the inhabitants are women,
and they are essentially witches who are skilled in
special magic such as curses and familiars.
Do not forget, we are talking about witches here.
I have known of men who got too close
and got turned into stink bugs or softshell turtles, then dropped into toilets.
Could it be that Vanessa suddenly disappeared
to try and get their queen to fix Asta's arms?
There is a rule stating that witches can only live in the Witches' Forest.
Which means that witches like Vanessa and myself who left our home are fugitives.
She would need great resolve to even consider going back.
I fell head over heels in love with my soulmate Zell, so what can I do?
We both dove head-first into the bottomless swamp called love.
You guys are so in love...
So I believed in you and followed you,
so how long are you going to make me live in this hovel, you worthless husband?!
She is continuously aiming at his vital points.
Maybe she should have been the assassin here.
Maybe I am not so jealous after all.
Why do not we get back on track?
If Vanessa went back into that forest...
I do not know all the details, but apparently Vanessa was very important to the queen.
If the rumors are true and she returns,
she will never be able to leave the forest again.
To be blunt, the queen is supreme.
She is so powerful that even the Diamond Kingdom will not try to deal with her.
Not to mention that it is impossible to reason with her.
Let me warn you, if you are also planning to go to the Witches' Forest...
you will not be able to come back alive.
If there is a clue to healing Asta's arms there...
Tell us how to get there.
I will not let anyone lay a finger on my beloved.
Asta helped me out a lot and showed me the way I needed to go.
It does not feel great to let that debt keep growing, either.
Besides, I cannot leave my last student hanging like this.
For now, I am just going to strengthen my lower body a heck of a lot!
I am not done yet, damn it!
My goal is to look like this!
Wait, what the heck is going on?!
We can talk about this later.
If we tell him why we are here...
I cannot let all of you go to such a dangerous place for my sake!
Come on, let us go to the W's Forest.
Is it an extra-wide forest or something?!
The only method I could think of for shutting someone up was killing them.
You might want to rethink your priorities.
The other day, this guy in front of the forest tried to talk to me
By the way, I thought I saw Vanessa a little while ago...
I do not even want to imagine what the queen would do if
a witch who broke the rules was found.
Vanessa, ever since you left this forest,
my plans strayed far from perfection.
If you master your thread magic as I told you to,
you will be able to control destiny itself.
And yet you let that man tempt you away...
We are perfect witches, and yet you let him use you...
You are the one who is imperfect.
I will only come back on one condition.
A little girl who does not understand her place needs to be disciplined.
We need to be extra careful from here on out!
We seem to be in Let us begin the operation!
You are dragging this out too much!
Just shut up for a while.
The queen runs her overwhelming magic throughout the forest,
so if we give off even a little magic, they will know we are here immediately.
Which means we will not be able to use my spatial magic.
You do not even have to use it.
If anyone with magic so much as enters here, they will immediately know.
And what happens if they find us?
Have you ever seen a honeycomb?
Uh, I do not have any magic, so I should be fine.
But then how are we supposed to get inside?
these cloaks I made come in!
Put one of these babies on, and ta-da!
Your magic, your presence, and your body will all disappear!
But it must be expensive, right?
If you order right now, you can get one for just 30,000 yuls!
And today, we have a one-time special offer!
I will throw in another one for free!
Get your magic items from Domina's Magic Items!
Buy your Vanishawl now for 30,000 yuls and get another one absolutely free!
Whoa, that is way too much!
Of course, they are free of charge.
You looked rather hopeful for a moment.
I am sure she was startled by how much Noelle offered her.
There is another way in over there!
Let us go in from there!
It appears that the Black Bulls we were monitoring are up to something strange.
They hurt Licht and took Vetto's life.
And then, when I went to the city,
this guy who kept breathing hard gave me a bouquet of a hundred roses!
I could kill someone right now.
This Vanishawl was originally made to fit just one person.
But this is better than being caught and becoming a human honeycomb, right?
I guess we will just have to deal until we get to the queen.
I mean, we are better off than them, at least.
Apparently she only made two of these cloaks.
And to think there are some cute little witchies right over there, giggling away...
Could you please tell me what we are doing here now?
Hey, could not you sell this love potion a little cheaper?
Did you hear a man's voice just now?
There is no way a man could get into this forest.
I only ever imagined love potions in my wildest dreams.
They are small, but if they find intruders, they become a pain.
They will call their friends and start firing magic bullets.
Then what you said earlier about honeycombs...
If they spot us, we are finished.
They will fill us with holes until we drop dead.
They get under your guard with their cute appearance, then they ruthlessly attack.
They will not find us as long as we are under this cloak.
Okay, now it is our turn.
Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear, oh dear...
A naked old man is clinging to me!
What the heck are you doing, Old Man Zell?!
I promise this is not on purpose.
That is the kind of thing Master is into.
You could not hold back, could you?
A cold glare from my own student...
We will just have to blast our way through to the queen's manor!
Might as well use my spatial magic, then!
We will take the shortest route!
The most handsome member of the Black Bulls: Finral Roulacase
My contact info is written on the back!!
The most handsome member of the Black Bulls: Finral Roulacase
My contact info is written on the back!!
Why do not we have some tea later?
The most handsome member of the Black Bulls: Finral Roulacase
My contact info is written on the back!!
I will be waiting for your reply.
Are we going to the place or what?!
This is not the shortest route at all!
None of them are giving me the time of day.
I still have not recovered from the shock.
The name tells you exactly what it does, huh?
This smoke has traces of magic in it.
It will work as a smokescreen for just a short while.
This is our chance to head straight to the queen's manor!
I scraped my back because I was not wearing a shirt.
That is your own fault for being into that sort of thing.
You have got it all wrong!
This was seriously just a coincidence!
What the hell are you doing?!
I do not know who you think you are, but get your foot off of her right now!
How dare an intruder like yourself address me in such a way?
I am the queen of this forest,
as well as Vanessa, are my descendants.
A child who does not listen to her mother needs a little discipline, do not you think?
Outsiders should stay out of it.
I am free to do whatever I want to my daughters.
You may be the Queen of Witches or whatever...
But that is got nothing to do with what I said.
I told you to get your foot off of her!
What a vile, imperfect little brat.
And right now, I cannot even fight with my swords.
But I am still better than anyone who would step on their own family!
You must be the brat Vanessa was talking about.
Why does she want to fix trash like you?
told me she would become my slave and live out the rest of her days here
in exchange for healing your arms.
Is that why they are here, too?
You told me that you would become the Wizard King someday, did not you?
I want you to make that dream come true.
none of your problems are just your own anymore.
Especially since I hid any intent to harm you.
I was able to distract you while the old man saved Asta.
So can we stop calling me that now?
Wind Creation Magic: Emperor of Slashing Winds.
Now get your foot off of her!
Miz Vanessa is one of us!
What could imperfect creatures such as yourselves possibly do?
as well as all of you, cannot escape your fates.
All that waits for you is the end seen in my divination here.
They were much faster than I expected.
I knew they would be coming,
but to think they would choose a time like this to show up.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun...
I bought an amazing magic item through the Magic Shopping Network.
This is an amazing item that makes you and your magic disappear!
It cost me five million yuls, but if I can finally enter the garden
of beautiful women known as the Witches' Forest, it is a bah-hargain.
It will only take twelve years to pay it off!
The Witches' Forest should be around here.
You are giving me the creeps!
This is the Forest of Gordons!
The Eye of the Midnight Sun is attacking the Witches' Forest.
Apparently another force is also trying to attack.
Black Clover, Page 58: The Battlefield Decision.
Stripping instantly is my master's magic.
